attributes.action: NHS staff should be exempt from parking charges at their work place.
attributes.background:
NHS staff will be under excessive pressure over the next few months at a minimum. Many will be working extra shifts.
Public transport will be running at reduced frequency meaning staff will have to drive to work.
It is only fair we suspend parking charges for them to make their lives easier.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
